DOC.HEADLINE: WERBEL NAMED ' BUILDER OF THE YEAR '
DOC.TEXT: Roger Werbel , president of Werbel Homes , has been chosen as " Builder of the Year " by the Building Industry Assn . of Southern California . A member of the association since 1969 , Werbel is also a past president and life director of the California Building Industry Assn . and a life director of the National Assn . of Home Builders . He was recognized by his peers for his outstanding contributions to the advancement of the building industry in Southern California . Werbel Homes has been_active in the Southern California home-building market since its founding in 1961 . The company currently builds_in the Antelope Valley .
